definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Anika_Wu: Life is like a one way street, none of them leads back.
sentences.chinese: 人生就像一條單行道，一去不復返。

sentences.english: In the second trial your trucks meet head-on travelling up the one-way road.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次試驗中，雙方的卡車在單行道上迎頭相遇。

sentences.english: The road to disorder is a one-way street.
sentences.chinese: 通向混亂之路是條有去無回的單行道。

sentences.english: Yet to Koreans, globalization was a one-way street.
sentences.chinese: 但對韓國人來說，全球化仍是一條單行道。

sentences.english: Of course, communication cannot be a one-way street.
sentences.chinese: 當然，交流不會是一個單行道。

sentences.english: Each of you controls a gate at your own end of the one-way road.
sentences.chinese: 你們每人控制單行道上靠近自己這一端的一扇大門。

sentences.english: It may, however, only go one way.
sentences.chinese: 不過，或許它走的是單行道。

sentences.english: It is like a one-way street with no U-turns.
sentences.chinese: 就好比是一條禁止掉頭的單行道。

sentences.english: Life is a lane but it is a rotative course.
sentences.chinese: 生命是單行道，但是一個循環的過程。

sentences.english: There weren't road signs. There were one-way streets.
sentences.chinese: 這裏沒有路標，這裏都是單行道。

definition: the road back to where one came from
an express train sets off/fig. to work in haste/to rush
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
Su'ao town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
local bus or train/slow train with many stops
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
